creator: dfwcomputer@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 22167
securenet.dll

Im using wamp and testing with apache 2.2.6 and 2.2.8 and i suspect others, i was getting 

Microsoft Visual C++ Debug Library error

Debug Assertion Failed!
Program: D:\wamp/bin/apache/apache2.2.8/httpd.exe
File: commit.c
Line: 69
Expression: ("Invalid file descriptor. File possibly closed by a different thread",0) 


i tracked it down to securenet.dll file causing the issues which is part of the hidemyip program. http://www.hide-my-ip.com/

Its not really a bug but a conflict, i wanted to let someone know as it took 6 hours to find it.

Ok, next time take a look at the http wiki, which is a good place for
such helpful advisories :)

http://wiki.apache.org/httpd/
creator: wrowe@apache.org
